Callie, Saraban:
I heard on the Talking Island there is a master that can teach You how to use this power. Trust in it. The wise teacher always sees the future of his students.
With its help, the wizards become powerful warriors, and thieves become skilled healers.
What's her name?.. Rean?.. Yes, I remember! Her name is Rean.
